title: Drawing, "Sailboat Docked, Newport", August 1885
medium: Recto: brush and watercolor, graphite on cream wove paper; verso: graphite
inscribed:
Recto, in graphite: bottom left corner: Newport / Aug / 85.
Verso, in graphite at upper left corner of sheet (written upside down and parallel to drawing): 1943-51-324 / I79; inscribed in drawing clockwise from bottom left: grayish black gray / wet sand / gray sand / yellow gray sand / light whitish / lightish blue / back of breaks warm dark / purplish black / blue grayish / edge of ripples have darker purplish.
description: Horizontal sheet cut down and with left edge folded on top of drawing.  Recto depicts a sailboat tethered to the left of a dock, with elements of rigging and scaffolding seen on the dock. Verso is a view of small waves lapping a shoreline with descriptions about the color of waves and sand inscribed in the drawing.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sailboat Docked, Newport", August 1885.
August 1885. Recto: brush and watercolor, graphite on cream wove paper; verso: graphite. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-324.
